title: TEXT_PLAIN | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Returns a JSON object that specifies the plain text message to use for a notification. This is a helper function that you use to
construct a message object for the SYSTEM$SEND_SNOWFLAKE_NOTIFICATION stored procedure.

Using SYSTEM$SEND_SNOWFLAKE_NOTIFICATION to send notifications ,
SYSTEM$SEND_SNOWFLAKE_NOTIFICATION ,
TEXT_HTML ,
APPLICATION_JSON
Content of the message to send.

A JSON-formatted string that specifies a message for the
SYSTEM$SEND_SNOWFLAKE_NOTIFICATION stored procedure to send.
See Using SYSTEM$SEND_SNOWFLAKE_NOTIFICATION to send notifications.
